name: One Shot (Zakroutil)
description:
This game was created in less than five days for the Summer #ue4jam, the goal of this platformer puzzle shooter is to use only ONE bullet to its full potential and enable the player to get as fast as possible to the end of the level. You must find a ballance between precise shooting and speed because the clock is always ticking....

If you like One Shot please consider supporting us!

Controls:

A/D - Walk Left/Right

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot
